import re
from itertools import groupby

def remove_duplicates(sentence):
    words = re.findall('', sentence)
    words = [next(g) for (_, g) in groupby(words)]
    sentence = ' '.join(words)
    return sentence

import re
from itertools import groupby

def remove_duplicates(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    words = [next(g) for (_, g) in groupby(words)]
    sentence = ''.join(words)
    return sentence
